name: ARFrame.WorldMappingStatus
desc: Possible values describing how thoroughly ARKit has mapped the the area visible in a given frame.

items.name: case limited
items.desc: World tracking has not yet sufficiently mapped the area around the current device position.

items.name: case extending
items.desc: World tracking has mapped recently visited areas, but is still mapping around the current device position.

items.name: case mapped
items.desc: World tracking has adequately mapped the visible area.
